channel.title: Character turns completely invisible when I equip a New Model

item.title: Character turns completely invisible when I equip a New Model
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

I added trident of seas and when ever I equip it, I turn completely invisible. I use a cache repacker and my model is in gz format and the model ids are 1052 and 1051 so it can’t be that the model ids… What can be the problem?

My Trident of seas staff ints:

case 15014: itemDef.name = "Trident of the seas"; itemDef.description = "A weapon from the deep." .getBytes(); itemDef.maleEquip1 = 1052; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 1052; itemDef.modelID = 1051; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 420; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1130; itemDef.modelZoom = 2755; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.actions[3] = "Check"; break;

Read full topic
item.source: Character turns completely invisible when I equip a New Model
